## Public Member Functions

### handleDiagnostics() {#aa08be76d0743fdecc66ac5abe9d6f8e1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LTOCodeGenerator.cpp&#125;::LTODiagnosticHandler::handleDiagnostics (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfo">DiagnosticInfo</a> &amp; DI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Override handleDiagnostics to provide custom implementation.

Return true if it handles diagnostics reporting properly otherwise return false to make LLVMContext::diagnose() to print the message with a prefix based on the severity.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/ltocodegenerator-cpp/#l00727">727</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/ltocodegenerator-cpp">LTOCodeGenerator.cpp</a>.
